etymology: a primitive relative pronoun (of every gender and number)
avSummary: which, wherewith, because, when, soon, whilst, as if, as when, that, until, much, whosoever, whereas, wherein, whom, whose
definition:
1) (relative part.)
    1a) which, who
    1b) that which
 2) (conj)
    2a) that (in obj clause)
    2b) when
    2c) since
    2d) as
    2e) conditional if
